channel.title: Need help with making admin!
channel.description:
Ok i am using hamachi and testscape... I have a compiler and when i logged on and then logged off, then changed rights to 3(owner) it didn't work. Can you not see the crown or something and can someone please come on... I tell you everything and make you admin or mod if you can help me fix it.
Thanks :D
-Owner Ownt-

item.title: Need help with making admin!

@ThE-DaWg22 wrote:

you change the rights to 3 or 2 or whatever, then go to data folder, admin txt file and the persons name

item.title: Need help with making admin!

item.description:
@ch33seymuff1n wrote:

ok well try uhh deadsoulsscape.no-ip.info

if that doesn’t work, wait do you have hamachi?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2007, 06:46:33 PM[/size][hr]When i make my person have 3 rights then try to log it says
Please wait 60 secs.
Then i click login and it works but i have 0 rights.
How do i fix that?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making admin!

item.description:
@artash wrote:

ch33seymuff1n. Thats pretty simple stuff. Test scape is pretty much like noobscape. VERY SIMPLE!. You can see your crown on admin or mod, just not staff. Ill come visit ur server if ya want. Just post IP
